overview: A military squad leader returns to his base, bringing a confiscated book that contains names of leaders and financiers of the rebels. But before he could present the book to his higher officials, rebels attack his base. The officer is killed and the rebels flee taking back the book and the girlfriend of the officer's assistant who is the lone survivor of the attack. Higher ups form a task force, headed by the lone survivor, to retrieve the book -- and his girlfriend.
title: Task Force Alamid
